   20: -module(inet_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("kernel/src/inet_res.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("kernel/src/inet_dns.hrl").
   26: -include("kernel_test_lib.hrl").
   27: 
   28: -export([
   29:          all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   31: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   33: 
   34: 	 t_gethostbyaddr/0, t_gethostbyaddr/1,
   35: 	 t_getaddr/0, t_getaddr/1,
   36: 	 t_gethostbyname/0, t_gethostbyname/1, t_gethostbyname_empty/1,
   37: 	 t_gethostbyaddr_v6/0, t_gethostbyaddr_v6/1,
   38: 	 t_getaddr_v6/0, t_getaddr_v6/1,
   39: 	 t_gethostbyname_v6/0, t_gethostbyname_v6/1,
   40: 	 ipv4_to_ipv6/0, ipv4_to_ipv6/1,
   41: 	 host_and_addr/0, host_and_addr/1,
   42: 	 t_gethostnative/1, 
   43: 	 gethostnative_parallell/1, cname_loop/1,
   44:          missing_hosts_reload/1, hosts_file_quirks/1,
   45:          gethostnative_soft_restart/0, gethostnative_soft_restart/1,
   46: 	 gethostnative_debug_level/0, gethostnative_debug_level/1,
   47: 	 lookup_bad_search_option/1,
   48: 	 getif/1,
   49: 	 getif_ifr_name_overflow/1,getservbyname_overflow/1, getifaddrs/1,
   50: 	 is_ip_address/1,
   51: 	 parse_strict_address/1, ipv4_mapped_ipv6_address/1, ntoa/1,
   52:          simple_netns/1, simple_netns_open/1,
   53:          add_del_host/1, add_del_host_v6/1,
   54:          simple_bind_to_device/1, simple_bind_to_device_open/1,
   55: 	 socknames_sctp/1, socknames_tcp/1, socknames_udp/1
   56:         ]).
   57: 
   58: -export([
   59:          get_hosts/1, get_ipv6_hosts/1, parse_hosts/1, parse_address/1,
   60: 	 kill_gethost/0, parallell_gethost/0, test_netns/0
   61:         ]).
   62: 
   63: 
   64: 
   65: suite() ->
   66:     [
   67:      {ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   68:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}
   69:     ].
   70: 
   71: all() -> 
   72:     [
   73:      t_gethostbyaddr, t_gethostbyname, t_gethostbyname_empty, t_getaddr,
   74:      t_gethostbyaddr_v6, t_gethostbyname_v6, t_getaddr_v6,
   75:      ipv4_to_ipv6, host_and_addr, is_ip_address, {group, parse},
   76:      t_gethostnative, gethostnative_parallell, cname_loop,
   77:      missing_hosts_reload, hosts_file_quirks,
   78:      gethostnative_debug_level, gethostnative_soft_restart,
   79:      lookup_bad_search_option,
   80:      getif, getif_ifr_name_overflow, getservbyname_overflow,
   81:      getifaddrs, parse_strict_address, ipv4_mapped_ipv6_address, ntoa,
   82:      simple_netns, simple_netns_open,
   83:      add_del_host, add_del_host_v6,
   84:      simple_bind_to_device, simple_bind_to_device_open,
   85:      {group, socknames}
   86:     ].
   87: 
   88: groups() -> 
   89:     [
   90:      {parse,     [], parse_cases()},
   91:      {socknames, [], socknames_cases()}
   92:     ].
   93: 
   94: parse_cases() ->
   95:     [
   96:      parse_hosts,
   97:      parse_address
   98:     ].
   99: 
  100: socknames_cases() ->
  101:     [
  102:      socknames_sctp,
  103:      socknames_tcp,
  104:      socknames_udp
  105:     ].
  106: 
  107: %% Required configuration
  108: required(v4) ->
  109:     [{require, test_host_ipv4_only},
  110:      {require, test_dummy_host}];
  111: required(v6) ->
  112:     [{require, test_host_ipv6_only},
  113:      {require, test_dummy_ipv6_host}];
  114: required(hosts) ->
  115:     case os:type() of
  116: 	{OS, _} when OS =:= win32 ->
  117: 	    [{require, hardcoded_hosts},
  118: 	     {require, hardcoded_ipv6_hosts}];
  119: 	_Else ->
  120: 	    [{require, test_hosts}]
  121:     end.     
  122: 
  123: 
  124: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  125: 
  126:     ?P("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  127:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  128:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  129: 
  130:     case ?LIB:init_per_suite([{allow_skip, false} | Config0]) of
  131:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  132:             SKIP;
  133: 
  134:         Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  135:             
  136:             %% We need a monitor on this node also
  137:             ?P("init_per_suite -> try start system monitor"),
  138:             kernel_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  139: 
  140:             ?P("init_per_suite -> end when "
  141:                "~n      Config: ~p", [Config1]),
  142: 
  143:             Config1
  144:     end.
  145: 
  146: end_per_suite(Config0) ->
  147: 
  148:     ?P("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  149:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  150:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  151: 
  152:     %% Stop the local monitor
  153:     ?P("init_per_suite -> try stop system monitor"),
  154:     kernel_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  155: 
  156:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  157: 
  158:     ?P("end_per_suite -> "
  159:             "~n      Nodes: ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  160: 
  161:     Config1.
  162: 
  163: 
  164: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  165:     Config.
  166: 
  167: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  168:     Config.
  169: 
  170: 
  171: init_per_testcase(Case, Config0) ->
  172:     ?P("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  173:        "~n   Config:   ~p"
  174:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  175:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  176:        "~n   Monitors: ~p",
  177:        [Config0, erlang:nodes(), links(), monitors()]),
  178: 
  179:     kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  180: 
  181:     Config1 = init_per_testcase2(Case, Config0),
  182: 
  183:     ?P("init_per_testcase -> done when"
  184:        "~n   Config:   ~p"
  185:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  186:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  187:        "~n   Monitors: ~p", [Config1, erlang:nodes(), links(), monitors()]),
  188:     Config1.
  189: 
  190: init_per_testcase2(gethostnative_debug_level, Config) ->
  191:     ?TT(?MINS(2)),
  192:     Config;
  193: init_per_testcase2(gethostnative_soft_restart, Config) ->
  194:     ?TT(?MINS(2)),
  195:     Config;
  196: init_per_testcase2(lookup_bad_search_option, Config) ->
  197:     Db = inet_db,
  198:     Key = res_lookup,
  199:     %% The bad option cannot enter through inet_db:set_lookup/1,
  200:     %% but through e.g .inetrc.
  201:     Prev = ets:lookup(Db, Key),
  202:     ets:delete(Db, Key),
  203:     ets:insert(Db, {Key,[lookup_bad_search_option]}),
  204:     ?P("init_per_testcase -> Misconfigured resolver lookup order"),
  205:     [{Key,Prev}|Config];
  206: init_per_testcase2(_Func, Config) ->
  207:     Config.
  208: 
  209: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  210:     ?P("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  211:        "~n   Config:   ~p"
  212:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  213:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  214:        "~n   Monitors: ~p",
  215:        [Config, erlang:nodes(), links(), monitors()]),
  216: 
  217:     ?P("system events during test: "
  218:        "~n   ~p", [kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  219: 
  220:     end_per_testcase2(Case, Config),
  221: 
  222:     ?P("end_per_testcase -> done with"
  223:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  224:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  225:        "~n   Monitors: ~p", [erlang:nodes(), links(), monitors()]),
  226:     ok.
  227: 
  228: end_per_testcase2(lookup_bad_search_option, Config) ->
  229:     ?P("end_per_testcase2 -> restore resolver lookup order"),
  230:     Db   = inet_db,
  231:     Key  = res_lookup,
  232:     Prev = proplists:get_value(Key, Config),
  233:     ets:delete(Db, Key),
  234:     ets:insert(Db, Prev),
  235:     ?P("end_per_testcase2 -> resolver lookup order restored");
  236: end_per_testcase2(_Func, _Config) ->
  237:     ok.
  238: 
  239: t_gethostbyaddr() -> required(v4).
  240: %% Test the inet:gethostbyaddr/1 function.
  241: t_gethostbyaddr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  242:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, fun() -> do_gethostbyaddr(Config) end).
  243: 
  244: do_gethostbyaddr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  245:     ?P("begin - try get config 'test_host_ipv4_only'"),
  246:     {Name, FullName, IPStr, {A,B,C,D} = IP, Aliases, _, _} =
  247:         ct:get_config(test_host_ipv4_only),
  248:     ?P("config 'test_host_ipv4_only': "
  249:        "~n   Name:      ~p"
  250:        "~n   Full Name: ~p"
  251:        "~n   IPStr:     ~p"
  252:        "~n   (IP) A:    ~p"
  253:        "~n   (IP) B:    ~p"
  254:        "~n   (IP) C:    ~p"
  255:        "~n   (IP) D:    ~p"
  256:        "~n   Aliases:   ~p",
  257:        [Name, FullName, IPStr, A, B, C, D, Aliases]),
  258:     Rname = integer_to_list(D) ++ "." ++
  259: 	integer_to_list(C) ++ "." ++
  260: 	integer_to_list(B) ++ "." ++
  261: 	integer_to_list(A) ++ ".in-addr.arpa",
  262:     HEnt = case inet:gethostbyaddr(IPStr) of
  263:                {ok, HE} ->
  264:                    HE;
  265:                {error, nxdomain = R1} ->
  266:                    exit({skip, R1})
  267:            end,
  268:     {ok, HEnt} = inet:gethostbyaddr(IP),
  269:     ?P("gethostbyaddr for (both):"
  270:        "~n   IPStr: ~p"
  271:        "~n   IP:    ~p"
  272:        "~n   => ~p", [IPStr, IP, HEnt]),
  273:     {error, Reason} = inet:gethostbyaddr(Name),
  274:     ok = ?P("Expected error with failure reason: "
  275:             "~n   (~w) ~s", [Reason, inet:format_error(Reason)]),
  276:     HEnt_ = HEnt#hostent{h_addrtype = inet,
  277:                          h_length = 4,
  278:                          h_addr_list = [IP]},
  279:     HEnt_ = HEnt,
  280:     case {os:type(),os:version()} of
  281:         {{unix,freebsd},{5,0,0}} ->
  282:             %% The alias list seems to be buggy in FreeBSD 5.0.0.
  283:             check_elems([{HEnt#hostent.h_name,[Name,FullName]}]),
  284:             ?P("Buggy alias list: ~p", [HEnt#hostent.h_aliases]),
  285:             ok;
  286:         _ ->
  287:             ?P("alias list: "
  288:                "~n   ~p", [HEnt#hostent.h_aliases]),
  289:             ?P("check alias list: "
  290:                "~n   ~p", [[Aliases,tl(Aliases),[Rname]]]),
  291:             ?P("name:       ~p", [HEnt#hostent.h_name]),
  292:             ?P("check name: ~p", [[Name,FullName]]),
  293:             check_elems(
  294: 	      [{HEnt#hostent.h_name,[Name,FullName]},
  295: 	       {HEnt#hostent.h_aliases,[[],Aliases,tl(Aliases),[Rname]]}])
  296:     end,
  297: 
  298:     ?P("try get config 'test_dummy_host'"),
  299:     {_DName, _DFullName, DIPStr, DIP, _, _, _} = ct:get_config(test_dummy_host),
  300:     {error,nxdomain} = inet:gethostbyaddr(DIPStr),
  301:     {error,nxdomain} = inet:gethostbyaddr(DIP),
  302: 
  303:     ?P("done"),
  304:     ok.
  305: 
  306: t_gethostbyaddr_v6() -> required(v6).
  307: %% Test the inet:gethostbyaddr/1 inet6 function.
  308: t_gethostbyaddr_v6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  309:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, fun() -> do_gethostbyaddr_v6(Config) end).
  310: 
  311: do_gethostbyaddr_v6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  312:     {Name6, FullName6, IPStr6, IP6, Aliases6} =
  313: 	ct:get_config(test_host_ipv6_only),
  314: 
  315:     case inet:gethostbyaddr(IPStr6) of
  316:         %% Even if IPv6 is not supported, the native resolver may succeed
  317: 	%% looking up the host. DNS lookup will probably fail.
  318: 	{error,nxdomain} ->
  319: 	    {skip, "IPv6 test fails! IPv6 not supported on this host!?"};
  320: 	{ok, HEnt6} ->
  321: 	    {ok, HEnt6} = inet:gethostbyaddr(IP6),
  322: 	    {error, Reason6} = inet:gethostbyaddr(Name6),
  323: 	    ok = ?P("Expected error with failure reason: "
  324:                     "~n   (~w) ~s", [Reason6, inet:format_error(Reason6)]),
  325: 	    HEnt6_ = HEnt6#hostent{h_addrtype = inet6,
  326: 				   h_length = 16,
  327: 				   h_addr_list = [IP6]},
  328: 	    HEnt6_ = HEnt6,
  329: 	    check_elems(
  330: 	      [{HEnt6#hostent.h_name,[Name6,FullName6]},
  331: 	       {HEnt6#hostent.h_aliases,[[],Aliases6,tl(Aliases6)]}]),
  332: 
  333: 	    {_DName6, _DFullName6, DIPStr6, DIP6, _} =
  334: 		ct:get_config(test_dummy_ipv6_host),
  335: 	    {error,nxdomain} = inet:gethostbyaddr(DIPStr6),
  336: 	    {error,nxdomain} = inet:gethostbyaddr(DIP6),
  337: 	    ok
  338:     end.
  339: 
  340: t_gethostbyname() -> required(v4).
  341: %% Test the inet:gethostbyname/1 function.
  342: t_gethostbyname(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  343:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, fun() -> do_gethostbyname(Config) end).
  344: 
  345: do_gethostbyname(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  346:     ?P("begin - try get config 'test_host_ipv4_only'"),
  347:     {Name, FullName, IPStr, IP, Aliases, IP_46_Str, _} =
  348: 	ct:get_config(test_host_ipv4_only),
  349:     ?P("config 'test_host_ipv4_only': "
  350:        "~n   Name:      ~p"
  351:        "~n   Full Name: ~p"
  352:        "~n   IPStr:     ~p"
  353:        "~n   IP:        ~p"
  354:        "~n   Aliases:   ~p"
  355:        "~n   IP_46_Str: ~p",
  356:        [Name, FullName, IPStr, IP, Aliases, IP_46_Str]),
  357:     case inet:gethostbyname(IPStr) of
  358:         {ok, _} ->
  359:             ok;
  360:         {error, nxdomain = R1} ->
  361:             exit({skip, R1})
  362:     end,
  363:     HEnt = case inet:gethostbyname(Name) of
  364:                {ok, HE} ->
  365:                    HE;
  366:                {error, nxdomain = R2} ->
  367:                    exit({skip, R2})
  368:            end,
  369:     {ok, HEnt} = inet:gethostbyname(list_to_atom(Name)),
  370:     HEnt_ = HEnt#hostent{h_addrtype  = inet,
  371: 			 h_length    = 4,
  372: 			 h_addr_list = [IP]},
  373: 
  374:     HEnt_ = HEnt,
  375:     check_elems([{HEnt#hostent.h_name,[Name,FullName]},
  376: 		 {HEnt#hostent.h_aliases,[[],Aliases,tl(Aliases)]}]),
  377:     {ok,HEntF} = inet:gethostbyname(FullName),
  378:     HEntF_ = HEntF#hostent{h_name = FullName,
  379: 			   h_addrtype = inet,
  380: 			   h_length = 4,
  381: 			   h_addr_list = [IP]},
  382:     HEntF_ = HEntF,
  383:     check_elems([{HEnt#hostent.h_aliases,[[],Aliases,tl(Aliases)]}]),
  384:     %%
  385:     FullNameU = toupper(FullName),
  386:     {ok,HEntU} = inet:gethostbyname(FullNameU),
  387:     FullNameU = toupper(HEntU#hostent.h_name),
  388:     #hostent{
  389:        h_addrtype = inet,
  390:        h_length = 4,
  391:        h_addr_list = [IP]} = HEntU,
  392:     check_elems(
  393:       [{[toupper(H) || H <- HEntU#hostent.h_aliases],
  394: 	[[],[toupper(A) || A <- Aliases]]}]),
  395: 
  396:     {DName, _DFullName, _DIPStr, _DIP, _, _, _} =
  397: 	ct:get_config(test_dummy_host),
  398:     {error,nxdomain} = inet:gethostbyname(DName),
  399:     {error,nxdomain} = inet:gethostbyname(IP_46_Str),
  400:     ok.
  401: 
  402: 
  403: t_gethostbyname_empty(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  404:     element(1, os:type()) =:= unix andalso
  405:         begin
  406:             {error,nxdomain} = inet:gethostbyname(""),
  407:             {error,nxdomain} = inet:gethostbyname('')
  408:         end,
  409:     {error,nxdomain} = inet:gethostbyname("."),
  410:     {error,nxdomain} = inet:gethostbyname('.'),
  411:     ok.
  412: 
  413: 
  414: t_gethostbyname_v6() -> required(v6).
  415: %% Test the inet:gethostbyname/1 inet6 function.
  416: t_gethostbyname_v6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  417:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, fun() -> do_gethostbyname_v6(Config) end).
  418: 
  419: do_gethostbyname_v6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  420:     {Name, FullName, IPStr, IP, Aliases} =
  421: 	ct:get_config(test_host_ipv6_only),
  422: 
  423:     case inet:gethostbyname(Name, inet6) of
  424: 	{ok,HEnt} ->
  425: 	    {ok,_} = inet:gethostbyname(IPStr, inet6),
  426: 	    {ok,HEnt} = inet:gethostbyname(list_to_atom(Name), inet6),
  427: 	    case HEnt#hostent.h_addr_list of
  428: 		[IP] -> % IPv6 address
  429: 		    #hostent{h_addrtype = inet6,
  430: 			     h_length = 16} = HEnt,
  431: 		    check_elems(
  432: 		      [{HEnt#hostent.h_name,[Name,FullName]},
  433: 		       {HEnt#hostent.h_aliases,[[],Aliases,tl(Aliases)]}]);
  434: 		[IP46] -> % IPv4 compatible address
  435: 		    {ok,HEnt4} = inet:gethostbyname(Name, inet),
  436: 		    #hostent{h_addrtype = inet,
  437: 			     h_length = 4,
  438: 			     h_addr_list = [IP4]} = HEnt4,
  439: 		    {ok,IP46} =
  440: 			inet_parse:ipv6_address(
  441: 			  "::ffff:" ++ inet:ntoa(IP4)),
  442: 		    check_elems(
  443: 		      [{HEnt#hostent.h_name,[Name,FullName]}])
  444: 	    end,
  445: 
  446: 	    {ok,HEntF} = inet:gethostbyname(FullName, inet6),
  447: 	    case HEntF#hostent.h_addr_list of
  448: 		[IP] -> % IPv6 address
  449: 		    #hostent{h_name = FullName,
  450: 			     h_addrtype = inet6,
  451: 			     h_length = 16} = HEntF,
  452: 		    check_elems(
  453: 		      [{HEnt#hostent.h_aliases,[[],Aliases,tl(Aliases)]}]);
  454: 		[IP46F] -> % IPv4 compatible address
  455: 		    {ok,HEnt4F} = inet:gethostbyname(FullName, inet),
  456: 		    #hostent{h_addrtype = inet,
  457: 			     h_length = 4,
  458: 			     h_addr_list = [IP4F]} = HEnt4F,
  459: 		    {ok,IP46F} =
  460: 			inet_parse:ipv6_address(
  461: 			  "::ffff:" ++ inet:ntoa(IP4F)),
  462: 		    check_elems(
  463: 		      [{HEntF#hostent.h_name,[Name,FullName]}])
  464: 	    end;
  465: 	_ ->
  466: 	    {skip, "IPv6 is not supported on this host"}
  467:     end.
  468: 
  469: check_elems([{Val,Tests} | Elems]) ->
  470:     ?P("check_elems -> entry with"
  471:        "~n   Val:   ~p"
  472:        "~n   Tests: ~p", [Val, Tests]),
  473:     check_elem(Val, Tests, Tests),
  474:     check_elems(Elems);
  475: check_elems([]) -> ok.
  476: 
  477: check_elem(Val, [Val|_], _) -> ok;
  478: check_elem(Val, [_|Tests], Tests0) ->
  479:     check_elem(Val, Tests, Tests0);
  480: check_elem(Val, [], Tests0) ->
  481:     ct:fail({no_match,Val,Tests0}).
  482: 
  483: 
  484: t_getaddr() -> required(v4).
  485: %% Test the inet:getaddr/2 function.
  486: t_getaddr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  487:     {Name,FullName,IPStr,IP,_,IP_46_Str,IP46} =
  488: 	ct:get_config(test_host_ipv4_only),
  489:     {ok,IP} = inet:getaddr(list_to_atom(Name), inet),
  490:     {ok,IP} = inet:getaddr(Name, inet),
  491:     {ok,IP} = inet:getaddr(FullName, inet),
  492:     {ok,IP} = inet:getaddr(IP, inet),
  493:     {ok,IP} = inet:getaddr(IPStr, inet),
  494:     {error,nxdomain} = inet:getaddr(IP_46_Str, inet),
  495:     {error,eafnosupport} = inet:getaddr(IP46, inet),
  496: 
  497:     {DName, DFullName, DIPStr, DIP, _, _, _} = ct:get_config(test_dummy_host),
  498:     {error,nxdomain} = inet:getaddr(DName, inet),
  499:     {error,nxdomain} = inet:getaddr(DFullName, inet),
  500:     {ok,DIP} = inet:getaddr(DIPStr, inet),
  501:     {ok,DIP} = inet:getaddr(DIP, inet),
  502:     ok.
  503: 
  504: t_getaddr_v6() -> required(v4) ++ required(v6).
  505: %% Test the inet:getaddr/2 function.
  506: t_getaddr_v6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  507:     {Name,FullName,IPStr,IP,_} =
  508: 	ct:get_config(test_host_ipv6_only),
  509: 
  510:     case inet:getaddr(Name, inet6) of
  511: 	{ok,Addr} ->
  512: 	    IP = Addr,
  513: 	    {ok,IP} = inet:getaddr(toupper(Name), inet6),
  514: 	    {ok,IP} = inet:getaddr(list_to_atom(Name), inet6),
  515: 	    {ok,IP} = inet:getaddr(list_to_atom(toupper(Name)), inet6),
  516: 	    {ok,IP} = inet:getaddr(FullName, inet6),
  517: 	    {ok,IP} = inet:getaddr(toupper(FullName), inet6),
  518: 	    {ok,IP} = inet:getaddr(IP, inet6),
  519: 	    {ok,IP} = inet:getaddr(IPStr, inet6),
  520: 	    %%
  521: 	    {DName,DFullName,DIPStr,DIP,_} =
  522: 		ct:get_config(test_dummy_ipv6_host),
  523: 	    {error,nxdomain} = inet:getaddr(DName, inet6),
  524: 	    {error,nxdomain} = inet:getaddr(DFullName, inet6),
  525: 	    {ok,DIP} = inet:getaddr(DIPStr, inet6),
  526: 	    {ok,DIP} = inet:getaddr(DIP, inet6),
  527: 	    ok;
  528: 	_ ->
  529:  	    {skip, "IPv6 is not supported on this host"}
  530:     end.
  531: 
  532: ipv4_to_ipv6() -> required(v4).
  533: %% Test if IPv4 address is converted to IPv6 address.
  534: ipv4_to_ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  535:     %% Test what happens if an IPv4 address is looked up in an IPv6 context.
  536:     %% If the native resolver succeeds to look it up, an IPv4 compatible
  537:     %% address should be returned. If no IPv6 support on this host, an
  538:     %% error should beturned.
  539:     {_Name,_FullName,IPStr,_IP,Aliases,IP_46_Str,IP_46} =
  540: 	ct:get_config(test_host_ipv4_only),
  541:     IP4to6Res =
  542: 	case inet:getaddr(IPStr, inet6) of
  543: 	    {ok,IP_46} ->
  544: 		io:format("IPv4->IPv6: success~n"),
  545: 		true;
  546: 	    E = {error,nxdomain} ->
  547: 		io:format("IPv4->IPv6: nxdomain~n"),
  548: 		E;
  549: 	    E = {error,eafnosupport} ->
  550: 		io:format("IPv6->IPv4: eafnosupport~n"),
  551: 		E;
  552: 	    Other ->
  553: 		ct:fail({ipv4_to_ipv6_lookup_failed,Other})
  554: 	end,
  555:     case {IP4to6Res,inet:gethostbyname(IPStr, inet6)} of
  556: 	{true,{ok,HEnt}} ->
  557: 	    HEnt_ = HEnt#hostent{h_addrtype = inet6,
  558: 				 h_length = 16,
  559: 				 h_addr_list = [IP_46]},
  560: 	    HEnt_ = HEnt,
  561: 	    check_elems([{HEnt#hostent.h_name,[IP_46_Str,IPStr]},
  562: 			 {HEnt#hostent.h_aliases,[[],Aliases,tl(Aliases)]}]);
  563: 	{_,IP4to6Res} -> ok
  564:     end,
  565:     ok.
  566: 
  567: 
  568: %% Test looking up hosts and addresses. Use 'ypcat hosts'
  569: %% or the local equivalent to find all hosts.
  570: 
  571: host_and_addr() ->
  572:     ?P("host_and_addr -> entry"),
  573:     %% [{timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
  574:     [{timetrap,{minutes,5}}|required(hosts)].
  575: 
  576: host_and_addr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  577:     ?P("host_and_addr -> entry with"
  578:        "~n   Config: ~p", [Config]),
  579: 
  580:     Hosts = get_hosts(Config),
  581: 
  582:     ?P("host_and_addr -> try hosts: "
  583:        "~n   ~p", [Hosts]),
  584: 
  585:     lists:foreach(fun try_host/1, Hosts),
  586: 
  587:     ?P("host_and_addr -> done"),
  588: 
  589:     ok.
  590: 
  591: try_host({IP0, Host}) ->
  592:     ?P("try_host -> entry with"
  593:        "~n   IP0:  ~p"
  594:        "~n   Host: ~p", [IP0, Host]),
  595: 
  596:     {ok, IP} = inet:getaddr(IP0, inet),
  597:     ?P("try_host -> IP: ~p", [IP]),
  598: 
  599:     IPs1 =
  600:         case inet:gethostbyaddr(IP) of
  601:             {ok, #hostent{h_name      = AHost,
  602:                           h_addr_list = AAddrs} = AHE} ->
  603:                 ?P("try_host -> got hostent (by addr): "
  604:                    "~n   AHost:  ~p"
  605:                    "~n   AAddrs: ~p", [AHost, AAddrs]),
  606:                 case string:prefix(AHost, Host) of
  607:                     nomatch ->
  608:                         %% 'Host' is not a prefix of 'AHost'
  609:                         %% Check if its the other way araound (just in case)
  610:                         case string:prefix(Host, AHost) of
  611:                             nomatch ->
  612:                                 ?P("[GHBA] Host entry for wrong host: "
  613:                                    "~n   ~p"
  614:                                    "~n   => SKIP", [AHE]),
  615:                                 exit({skip, {invalid_hostent, addr,
  616:                                              AHost, Host}});
  617:                             _ -> % Yes
  618: 				?P("'HHost' prefix of 'Host'"),
  619:                                 AAddrs
  620:                         end;
  621:                     _ -> % Yes
  622: 			?P("'Host' prefix of 'AHost'"),
  623:                         AAddrs
  624:                 end;
  625:             {error, AReason} ->
  626:                 ?P("Failed get hostent (by addr) for ~p: "
  627:                    "~n   Reason: ~p"
  628:                    "~n   => SKIP", [IP, AReason]),
  629:                 exit({skip, {failed_get_hostent, addr}})
  630:         end,
  631: 
  632:     _IPs2 =
  633:         case inet:gethostbyname(Host) of
  634:             {ok, #hostent{h_name      = NHost,
  635:                           h_addr_list = NAddrs} = NHE} ->
  636:                 ?P("try_host -> got hostent (by name): "
  637:                    "~n   NHost:  ~p"
  638:                    "~n   NAddrs: ~p", [NHost, NAddrs]),
  639:                 case string:prefix(NHost, Host) of
  640:                     nomatch ->
  641:                         %% 'Host' is not a prefix of 'NHost'
  642:                         %% Check if its the other way araound (just in case)
  643:                         case string:prefix(Host, NHost) of
  644:                             nomatch ->
  645:                                 ?P("[GHBN] Host entry for wrong host: "
  646:                                    "~n   ~p"
  647:                                    "~n   => SKIP", [NHE]),
  648:                                 exit({skip, {invalid_hostent, name,
  649:                                              NHost, Host}});
  650:                             _ -> % Yes
  651: 				?P("'NHost' prefix of 'Host'"),
  652:                                 NAddrs
  653:                         end;
  654:                     _ -> % Yes
  655: 			?P("'Host' prefix of 'NHost'"),
  656:                         NAddrs
  657:                 end;
  658:             {error, NReason} ->
  659:                 ?P("Failed get hostent (by name) for ~p: "
  660:                    "~n   Reason: ~p"
  661:                    "~n   => SKIP", [Host, NReason]),
  662:                 exit({skip, {failed_get_hostent, name}})
  663:         end,
  664: 
  665:     ?P("try_host -> verify IP: "
  666:        "~n   IP:   ~p"
  667:        "~n   IPs1: ~p", [IP, IPs1]),
  668:     true = lists:member(IP, IPs1),
  669:     
  670:     ?P("try_host -> host '~s' (~s) done", [Host, IP0]),
  671:     ok.
  672: 
  673: %% Get all hosts from the system using 'ypcat hosts' or the local
  674: %% equvivalent.
  675: 
  676: get_hosts(_Config) ->
  677:     Hosts = ct:get_config(test_hosts),
  678:     %% Hosts = _
  679:     case os:type() of
  680: 	{unix, _} ->
  681: 	    List = lists:map(fun(X) ->
  682: 				     atom_to_list(X)++" "
  683: 			     end, Hosts),
  684: 	    Cmd = "ypmatch "++List++" hosts.byname", 
  685: 	    HostFile = os:cmd(Cmd),
  686: 	    get_hosts(HostFile, [], [], []);
  687: 	_ -> 
  688: 	    ct:get_config(hardcoded_hosts)
  689:     end.
  690: 
  691: get_ipv6_hosts(_Config) -> 
  692:     case os:type() of
  693: 	{unix, _} ->
  694: 	    List = lists:map(fun(X) ->
  695: 				     atom_to_list(X)++" "
  696: 			     end, ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts)),
  697: 	    Cmd = "ypmatch "++List++" ipnodes.byname", 
  698: 	    HostFile = os:cmd(Cmd),
  699: 	    get_hosts(HostFile, [], [], []);
  700: 	_ -> 
  701: 	    ct:get_config(hardcoded_ipv6_hosts)
  702:     end.
  703: 
  704: get_hosts([$\t|Rest], Cur, Ip, Result) when Ip /= [] ->
  705:     get_hosts(Rest, Cur, Ip, Result);
  706: get_hosts([$\t|Rest], Cur, _Ip, Result) ->
  707:     get_hosts(Rest, [], lists:reverse(Cur), Result);
  708: get_hosts([$\r|Rest], Cur, Ip, Result) ->
  709:     get_hosts(Rest, Cur, Ip, Result);
  710: get_hosts([$\n|Rest], Cur, Ip, Result) ->
  711:     [First|_] = string:tokens(lists:reverse(Cur), " "),
  712:     Ips = string:tokens(Ip, ","),
  713:     Hosts = [{I, First} || I <- Ips],
  714:     get_hosts(Rest, [], [], Hosts++Result);
  715: get_hosts([C|Rest], Cur, Ip, Result) ->
  716:     get_hosts(Rest, [C|Cur], Ip, Result);
  717: get_hosts([], _, _, Result) ->
  718:     Result.
  719: 
  720: 
  721: parse_hosts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  722:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  723:     HostFile = filename:join(DataDir, "hosts"),
  724:     inet_parse:hosts(HostFile),
  725:     HostFileErr1 = filename:join(DataDir, "hosts_err1"),
  726:     inet_parse:hosts(HostFileErr1),
  727:     Resolv = filename:join(DataDir,"resolv.conf"),
  728:     inet_parse:resolv(Resolv),
  729:     ResolvErr1 = filename:join(DataDir,"resolv.conf.err1"),
  730:     inet_parse:resolv(ResolvErr1).
  731: 
  732: parse_address(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  733:     V4Reversable =
  734: 	[{{0,0,0,0},"0.0.0.0"},
  735:          {{1,2,3,4},"1.2.3.4"},
  736: 	 {{253,252,251,250},"253.252.251.250"},
  737: 	 {{1,2,255,254},"1.2.255.254"}],
  738:     V6Reversable =
  739: 	[{{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0},"::"},
  740: 	 {{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1},"::1"},
  741: 	 {{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,2},"::0.0.0.2"},
  742: 	 {{15,0,0,0,0,0,0,2},"f::2"},
  743: 	 {{15,16#f11,0,0,0,0,256,2},"f:f11::100:2"},
  744: 	 {{16#700,0,0,0,0,0,0,0},"700::"},
  745: 	 {{0,0,0,0,0,0,2,1},"::0.2.0.1"},
  746: 	 {{0,0,0,0,0,3,2,1},"::3:2:1"},
  747: 	 {{0,0,0,0,4,3,2,1},"::4:3:2:1"},

  750: 	 {{0,7,6,5,4,3,2,1},"0:7:6:5:4:3:2:1"},
  751: 	 {{7,0,0,0,0,0,0,0},"7::"},
  752: 	 {{7,6,0,0,0,0,0,0},"7:6::"},
  753: 	 {{7,6,5,0,0,0,0,0},"7:6:5::"},

  768: 	  "c11:c22:5c33:c440:55c0:c66c:77:88"},

  822: 	  "::c66c:77:88"},
  823: 	 {{16#c11,0,0,0,0,0,16#77,16#88},
  824: 	  "c11::77:88"},

  826: 	  "c11:c22::88"},
  827: 	 {{16#c11,16#c22,16#5c33,0,0,0,0,0},
  828: 	  "c11:c22:5c33::"},
  829: 	 {{0,0,0,0,0,65535,258,65534},"::ffff:1.2.255.254"},
  830:          {{16#fe80,12345,0,0,0,0,0,16#12},"fe80::12%012345"},
  831: 	 {{16#ffff,16#ffff,16#ffff,16#ffff,16#ffff,16#ffff,16#ffff,16#ffff},
  832: 	  "ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff"}
  833:          |[{list_to_tuple(P++[(D1 bsl 8) bor D2,(D3 bsl 8) bor D4]),
  834:             Q++S}
  835:            || {{D1,D2,D3,D4},S} <-
  836:                   tl(V4Reversable),
  837:               {P,Q} <-
  838:                   [{[0,0,0,0,0,16#ffff],"::ffff:"},
  839:                    {[0,0,0,0,0,0],"::"}]]],
  840:     V4Sloppy =
  841: 	[{{10,1,16#98,16#76},"10.0x019876"},

  853: 	 {{16#12,16#34,16#56,16#78},"0x12.0x345678"},
  854: 	 {{16#12,16#34,16#56,16#78},"0x12.0X34.0x5678"},
